DOC.brief_summary: A six-month study investigate effect Ginkgo Synergy® Choline OPC Synergy® Catalyn® cognitive immune function marker quality life among healthy old adult history significant cognitive deficit
DOC.criteria: 60 year age old English speak Not live skilled intermediate care level nursing facility No use dietary supplement cognitive function two week enrol study length trial A MiniMental State Exam ( MMSE ) score ≥ 23 A cognitive deficit great indicate accord MMSE score A clinical diagnosis AD and/or relate disorder A psychiatric diagnosis schizophrenia , psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder , major depression psychotic feature , delirium , alcohol substance abuse/dependence Bleeding disorder Aphasia sensory , motor , and/or visual disturbance would interfere psychometric test Gastrointestinal disorder cause impaired absorption study supplement Insulindependent diabetes Major condition cardiovascular , pulmonary , renal , thyroid , hepatic , gastrointestinal , seizure Hematologic oncologic disorder treat chemotherapy previous two year Active chemotherapy radiation treatment cancer Current cigarette smoking More three major medical psychiatric hospitalization past year Diagnosis terminal illness A T score > 70 Global Severity Index Brief Symptoms Inventory ( BSI ) A score ≥ 29 Beck Depression InventoryII ( BDI ) ( 15 ) Prescription OTC sympathomimetic amine antihistamine within 2 day assessment visit Cognition enhance drug consumption Donepezil , Rivastigmine , Galantamine , Tacrine Coumadin , tricyclic antidepressant , antipsychotic , anticonvulsant Cognitionenhancing supplement , herb , antioxidant could stop trial Participating concurrent trial drug , supplement , treatment affect behavior cognitive function
